description: This source file defines the security configuration for a Spring Boot application, setting up JWT-based stateless authentication, security filters, and password encoding.

classes.name: SecurityConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for Spring Security, defining security policies, JWT filter, password encoder, and authentication manager.

methods.name: securityFilterChain
methods.description: Defines the security filter chain, specifying protected endpoints, permitted paths, and JWT filter integration.

methods.name: passwordEncoder
methods.description: Provides a BCryptPasswordEncoder bean for password hashing.

methods.name: userDetailsService
methods.description: Returns the UserService as the UserDetailsService implementation.

methods.name: authenticationManager
methods.description: Creates and returns an AuthenticationManager using a DAO-based provider with configured user details service and password encoder.
